name: High School Bus Driving
description:
You are appointed to drive and transport your student passengers in this realistic game. You must drive on a scheduled time and choose the best path to reach your destination. As you drive around the fantastic city roads you will experience how it feels to be a real life of school bus driver. Pick the passengers at the bus stop and drop them to their target location on time.

Features:
• Awesome high school bus driving experience
• Pick and drop kids from school & homes
• Explore the offroad & big city environment
• Amazing gameplay with high definition graphics
• Smooth controls and fun gameplay
